import React, { Component } from 'react' import '../chat.css' import emoji from './emoticonos.svg' import { Query } from 'react-apollo' import gql from 'graphql-tag' import Cookie from 'js-cookie' const CHATCONTENT_QUERY = gql` query Chat($from: Int, $to: Int){ conversation(from: $from, to:$to){ id_msg to_id from_id date_time message } } ` export default function Chatcontent({conversation}) { const from = Cookie.get('user') console.log(from, conversation) return (
